probably noob question but how do i play this i have ePSXe working but i dont have an exe file in this dragoon download just a .7z so im stuck at how you get it to work in the emulator

@davitz - just extract the 7z file with winrar and you should get an iso file go to epsxe and go to file then run iso, and find your file.

@ljparker - when the game tells you to switch to disc 2, etc. press esc (on keyboard) go to file, and then change disc.
